'''''Minecraft Live: March 2025 (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the soundtrack released for [[Minecraft LIVE – March 2025]], featuring compositions by Camilo Forero, Niccolo Pacella and David Murillo R., which feature all of the music included as part of the event. The soundtrack was released on March 22, 2025.
